Name: Test Pilot
Ingredients: 45 ml Jamaican aged blended rum with funk
22.5 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A citrusy, sophisticated Daiquiri with hints of almond and spicy clove, served short over ice.
History: Created circa 1941 by Donn Beach , this recipe is adapted from a recipe by Victor Bergeron and published in his 1972 Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide .
Nutrition: One serving of Test Pilot contains 178 calories
